channel.title: Visual Basic Question
channel.description: First off... this is qustions... right place. [hr] Ok i want to know how to make a program witch loads a sertan file extension of yous (eg)some filename here.myextentionhere... I want it to open/save it aswel... any ideas?

item.title: Visual Basic Question
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Groans and mumbles something really rotten about VB Anyway, you’d probably want to have it write to an SQL database… Don’t ask me though, take up Hex’s offer. I don’t like VB at all, mainly because the syntax was so weird after doing stuff in c++ and java. -.-

EDIT: Nevermind that, just re-read Hex’s post and he did mention using a database in particular rather then your idea of writing to just any file type. I’m going to bed, 1:34am here yawns.

Read full topic
